Decorative Plant, Phoenix Palm
Plante décorative, Palmier phoenix
Dekorative Pflanze, Dattelpalme
Pianta decorativa - Palma delle Canarie
Planta decorativa, Palmera canaria
観葉植物・フェニックスロベレニー
관엽식물, 피닉스야자
House Plant, Roebelen Palm
盆栽：軟葉刺葵
盆栽：軟葉刺葵
Decorative Plant, Phoenix Palm
kDesc
The phoenix palm has soft leaves on branches that hang from its perpendicular trunk.[#Legal]
Le palmier phoenix a des feuilles douces sur des branches qui pendent de son tronc perpendiculaire.[#Legal]
Die Dattelpalme hat weiche Blätter, die von den Zweigen ihres aufrechten Stammes hängen.[#Legal]
La palma delle Canarie ha delle foglie morbide sui suoi rami che pendono perpendicolarmente al tronco.[#Legal]
La palmera canaria tiene finas hojas en sus ramas, que cuelgan perpendicularmente de su tronco.[#Legal]
直立した幹から柔らかい葉が垂れ下がる、フェニックスロベレニーの観葉植物。[#Legal]
곧게 뻗은 줄기에서 부드러운 잎이 드리워진 관엽식물 피닉스야자. [#Legal]
A house plant named roebelen palm. Soft leaves dangle from its upright trunk. [#Legal]
軟葉刺葵盆栽。直立的樹幹上垂著一片片柔軟的葉子。[#Legal]
軟葉刺葵盆栽。直立的樹幹上垂著一片片柔軟的葉子。[#Legal]
The phoenix palm has soft leaves on branches that hang from its perpendicular trunk.[#Legal]
